name: TechJobsinBerlinbyCaissaRecruitment
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Tech Jobs in Berlin is a flash briefing where the Caissa Recruitment team shares new job opportunities for developers, software engineers and tech leaders in Berlin, Germany. 

Types of roles featured include:
Golang Developer Jobs
JavaScript React and Vue Openings
Full Stack Positions 
Front End Developer Jobs
Back End Engineering Roles
PHP Engineer Jobs
Ruby Jobs in Berlin
Director of Technology Roles
Vice President of Tech Positions
Chief Technology Officer Jobs 

Salaries in Berlin
Caissa Recruitment’s annual survey identifies exactly what the market for tech talent in Berlin looks like. From demand for different tech stacks to salary levels and how corporate recruitment practices are changing - the Caissa team shares their knowledge in the Annual Survey. 

Recruitment Industry Insights
Every week Caissa Recruitment shares thoughts and insights about the industry through the Caissa Recruitment YouTube channel. 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCU8Ktr88OIgLQxTsF7W-2Zw

Find a new Tech job in Berlin
Caissa Recruitment’s founder Konstanty Sliwowski has recently published an e-book for job seekers - The Developer’s & Software Engineer’s Guide to Getting A New Job. In the book, he exposes how tech teams in Berlin review and rate candidates and how to present oneself in the best position for a role.

https://www.amazon.de/Developers-Software-Engineers-Getting-English-ebook/dp/B08BRV7L9W
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
